name: Last Stand (CliveTheBird)
description:
Last Stand

Enemy forces have surrounded you castle and are beginning to siege. You are outnumbered and it’s only a matter of time before your castle is reduced to rubble. Use the materials available to you to build defences to delay the inevitable.

How to play: Build Phase:

  1. Select a material to build with.
  2. Place blocks to protect your castle.
  3. Press the play button to start Defending.

Defence Phase:

  1. During the Defence Phase you cannot build more blocks.
  2. Click on blocks with the activatable symbol to turn them on. Use them wisely.
  3. Rounds get progressively harder.
  4. Different materials can withstand more hits, but they cost more.

Controls:

  1. Place Block/use activatable block: Left mouse button
  2. Rotate Block: Mouse Scroll/right Mouse button

Blocks

  1. Glass (basic): Glass is the weakest and lightest block but also the cheapest option.
  2. Wood (basic): Wood has a moderate strength and weight and therefore can withstand a few hits from projectiles but is a bit more expensive.
  3. Stone (basic):Stone is the strongest and heaviest block and is therefore more sturdy and therefore can withstand a few hits from projectiles but is a bit more expensive.
  4. Zappy (special):An enhanced wooden block with Plasma Powers. Active: turn on the Plasma for a short period of time, any projectile that hits the laser will be instantly destroyed

Basic blocks can be placed as either a Square or a rectangle:
